snippet.title: Robot Zombies Gameplay
snippet.description:
2D platformer shooting game. Made with Unity3D game engine

This is the first game I've made myself.

[Storyline: A virus outbreak caused all the fellow robots to turn zombie. You must escape from the factory by fighting them. The game ends with a Boss battle.]

You can download and play the game from itch.io link - https://crew7studiogames.itch.io/robot-zombies

My itch.io page link - https://crew7studiogames.itch.io

Contact me at - crew7studiogames@gmail.com


You can download the complete project with Assets and Scripts from my Github page link - https://github.com/Crew7Studio/01_Robot_Zombies

Thanks to GamePlusJame tutorial link - https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLiyfvmtjWC_Up8XNvM3OSqgbJoMQgHkVz

Used OBS recorder to record the video.
